channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why every CEO—and every American—should be fed up with Trump’s Fed attack
item.description: CEOs must recognize that they can inadvertently become complicit in the erosion of core American values as they watch, worried from the sidelines.

item.title: Trump Media’s latest crypto venture borrows a page from the MicroStrategy playbook: hoard a specific cryptocurrency and dress it up as a business
item.description: Trump Media said it plans to purchase $105 million worth of the token created by Crypto.com that the new company will hold.

item.title: Parents suing OpenAI and Sam AItman allege ChatGPT coached their 16-year-old into taking his own life
item.description: The wrongful death lawsuit said Adam Raine started using ChatGPT last year to help with challenging schoolwork.

item.title: Court tosses Trump lawsuit against Maryland federal judges, saying allowing it to continue would ‘offend the rule of law’
item.description: U.S. District Judge Thomas Cullen, who was nominated by President Donald Trump, also criticized the administration's attacks on the judiciary.

item.title: ‘Consumers are going to be shocked’: An expiring tariff exemption for goods under $800 is about to throttle the world of e-commerce
item.description: International packages ordered under the disappearing 'de minimis' exemption will incur charges that range from 10% to 50% of their declared value.

item.title: Consumers’ view of the U.S. job market has deteriorated
Wall Street is more focused on Nvidia than on threat posed to Fed independence
U.S. stocks mixed at opening bell even after Trump’s play for Fed influence
Dow recovering losses as stocks brush off Trump’s bid to fire Fed’s Cook — live
Watch for Starbucks and Dunkin’ to enjoy a pumpkin-spice halo effect
